TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ModuleHandle extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 表示模块的运行时句柄。

span.span: Represents a runtime handle for a module.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和方法为字段、 方法和当前模块中的类型提供的元数据标记以高效方式解决方法的运行时句柄。The , , and methods provide efficient resolution of metadata tokens to runtime handles for fields, methods, and types in the current module.

summary.span: 获取元数据流版本。

span.span: Gets the metadata stream version.

value.span: 表示元数据流版本的 32 位整数。

span.span: A 32-bit integer representing the metadata stream version.

value.span: 高序位的两个字节表示主版本号，低序位的两个字节表示次版本号。

span.span: The high-order two bytes represent the major version number, and the low-order two bytes represent the minor version number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 元数据标头的详细信息，请参阅第 ii 部分： 元数据定义和语义文档。For more information on the metadata header, see the Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics documentation. 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要解决的父代的标识字段的元数据标记`TypeSpec`有一个包含元素类型的签名`var`或`mvar`，使用方法重载，它允许你提供必要的上下文。To resolve a metadata token that identifies a field whose parent `TypeSpec` has a signature containing element type `var` or `mvar`, use the method overload, which allows you to supply the necessary context. > [!NOTE] > 公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档，尤其是"第 ii 部分： 元数据定义和语义"中找不到有关元数据令牌的信息。Information about metadata tokens can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

exception.span: 不是当前模块范围内的有效令牌。

span.span: is not a valid token in the scope of the current module.

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-

exception.span: 不是当前模块范围内的字段的令牌。

span.span: is not a token for a field in the scope of the current module.

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-

exception.span: 标识了一个字段，该字段的父 有一个包含元素类型 或 的签名。

span.span: identifies a field whose parent has a signature containing element type or .

exception.span: 该方法在空字段句柄上调用。

span.span: The method is called on an empty field handle.

param.name: fieldToken
param.span: 一个元数据令牌，用于标识模块中的一个字段。

span.span: A metadata token that identifies a field in the module.

param.name: typeInstantiationContext
param.span: 结构的数组，表示标记所在范围内的类型的泛型类型参数，如果类型不是泛型，则为 。

span.span: An array of structures representing the generic type arguments of the type where the token is in scope, or if that type is not generic.

span.span: An array of structures representing the generic type arguments of the method where the token is in scope, or if that method is not generic.

span.span: Returns a runtime type handle for the type identified by the specified metadata token, specifying the generic type arguments of the type and method where the token is in scope.
A for the type identified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档，尤其是"第 ii 部分： 元数据定义和语义"中找不到有关元数据令牌的信息。Information about metadata tokens can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

exception.span: 不是当前模块中类型的有效元数据标记。

span.span: is not a valid metadata token for a type in the current module.

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-

exception.span: 不是当前模块范围内的类型的令牌。

span.span: is not a token for a type in the scope of the current module.

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-

exception.span: 是一个 ，它的签名中包含元素类型 或 。

span.span: is a whose signature contains element type or .

exception.span: 该方法在空类型句柄上调用。

span.span: The method is called on an empty type handle.

exception.span: 不是有效的令牌。

span.span: is not a valid token.
